project_name.justification: The title of the press release is 'Almaden Enters into Agreement to Sell the Rock Creek Mill'.

company_name.justification: The text identifies the buyer as Metals Exploration PLC: '...to sell certain assets comprising the Rock Creek Mill to Metals Exploration PLC (LSE AIM: MTL) (the “Purchaser”)...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text provides the name of the Chair for the seller (Almaden Minerals Ltd.), but does not mention the CEO or any executive for the buyer, Metals Exploration PLC.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text describes the transaction as a sale of 'certain assets comprising the Rock Creek Mill' but does not specify a percentage of interest being acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The primary commodity is taken from the authoritative metadata provided in the prompt as it is not mentioned in the source text.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The purchase price is explicitly stated in US dollars: '...for a purchase price of US$9,700,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total purchase price is stated as 'US$9,700,000'. The text confirms this is a cash payment by detailing the payment installments: 'US$2,000,000 is due...', 'US$3,000,000 shall be paid...', 'US$2,000,000 shall be paid...', 'US$2,700,000 shall be paid...'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is described entirely in terms of cash payments, with no mention of shares being issued as part of the purchase price.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment is explicitly defined as cash, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned in the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned in the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment is mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or any other royalty is mentioned as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: No coverage area is mentioned for the project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area unit is mentioned for the project.

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain any statement of mineral resources for the Rock Creek Mill.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the buyer and its ticker: 'Metals Exploration PLC (LSE AIM: MTL) (the “Purchaser”)'.
